attributes.action: Invite The Dalai Lama to G8 Summit to Meet Hu Jintao
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask Mr. Brown to urge the G8 Summit leaders especially the Japanese PM, Fukuda, to invite the Dalai Lama to the Summit this July in Japan, to have a direct dialogue with Hu Jintao along with the G8 members, to resolve Tibet-China issue. The Dalai Lama can be invited along with other Nobel Peace Prize Laureates, to discuss environment and peace issue, so that there will be less tension from Hu Jintao's side. The G8 Summit is a great opportunity to introduce the Dalai Lama to Hu Jintao. Tibet issue effects everyone in the world. We request you strongly to act immediately to make this happen.
Thank you very much. Free Tibet Team Japam
